001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.http.legacy;
002
003/**
004 * Placeholder for the historical assembler implementation that referred to legacy sinks.
005 * The modern RADAR pipeline no longer depends on this class; attempting to use it will
006 * immediately fail.
007 */
008@Deprecated
009public final class LegacyHttpAssembler {
010  /**
011   * Legacy hook invoked for each TCP segment; always throws {@link UnsupportedOperationException}.
012   *
013   * @param timestampMicros capture timestamp in microseconds
014   * @param src source IP address
015   * @param srcPort source TCP port
016   * @param dst destination IP address
017   * @param dstPort destination TCP port
018   * @param sequence TCP sequence number
019   * @param fromClient {@code true} when the segment originated from the client
020   * @param payload TCP payload bytes
021   * @param offset payload offset within the array
022   * @param length number of bytes provided in {@code payload}
023   * @param fin whether the FIN flag was set
024   * @throws UnsupportedOperationException always thrown to signal unsupported usage
025   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
026   */  public void onTcpSegment(
027      long timestampMicros,
028      String src,
029      int srcPort,
030      String dst,
031      int dstPort,
032      long sequence,
033      boolean fromClient,
034      byte[] payload,
035      int offset,
036      int length,
037      boolean fin) {
038    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Legacy assembler is not supported; use the new pipeline");
039  }
040}
041
042
